DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether eight therapy session foot reflexology reduce pain intensity apply addition standard care low back pain accord Malaysian low back pain management guideline .
DOC.brief_title: Foot Reflexology Therapy Non-specific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Low back pain common health complaint society . Many treatment low back pain aim reduce suffer quicken recovery minimize recurrence development chronic disability . However , low back pain continue societal enigma . The aim study investigate whether eight therapy session foot reflexology reduce pain intensity apply addition standard care low back pain accord Malaysian low back pain management guideline . Analysis health-related quality life also carry .
DOC.criteria: Have medically diagnose nonspecific low back pain . Have receive treatment low back pain within previous 2 week . Are least 18 year old . Have foot toe intact free wound . Have undergone complementary alternative therapy study . Have severe coexistent disease serious pathology systemic illness . Have specific diagnose cause back pain ( infection , tumour , osteoporosis , fracture , inflammatory condition cauda equine syndrome ) . Have plantar fasciitis . Lack ability read write Malaysia language . Had plan move area .
